trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-just the sinner I've been looking for-ho.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_002<tab>Another one of those recording devices has arrived from Konogg. Seems the lad has more he wants to say to you. Here.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_003<tab>When you have a moment, be sure to see what's on it.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_004<tab>(-???-)You there!
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_100_004<tab>Yes, the two of you! What are you doin', talkin' and noddin' suspiciously!? What are you up to!?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_005<tab><gasp> You're conspirin' to take over the village, aren't you!? Just like those murderous machines!
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_GLAGG_000_006<tab>Huh? What am I...? What did I just...? Unnngh, my head...
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007<tab>Something's not right with Glagg. And it's not quite the same sort of “not right” what follows a few too many casks of ale...
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008<tab>Well, whatever it is, it's nothing you need to worry about. I'll take care of it.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_009<tab>Now then, was there something else you needed?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_A1_000_001<tab>Is there anything I can help with?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_A1_000_002<tab>How's the rebuilding coming along?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_011<tab>Hmmm, well...
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_012<tab>(-???-)Excuse me...
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_013<tab>You... What do you want? If you're here to mock us, have done with it and leave us be.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_014<tab>N-No, I'm not here to mock you. On the contrary, I want to join you.

TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_015<tab>I'm usually not one to get involved, preferring to observe from a safe distance while making the occasional comment to remind people of my presence. But seeing how hard you've been working for the village, I couldn't help but want to make myself useful for a change.

TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_016<tab>Well, we could certainly use all the help we can get... What say you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Shall we welcome him to the crew?
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_017<tab>Thank you! I'm certain you won't regret it!
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_018<tab>After that strangeness with Glagg, I wasn't sure what to expect from our dour friend, but it sure wasn't an offer of help.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_019<tab>Anyway, I'll find a moment to talk with the fellow about our plans. And when he's managed to settle in, you ought to have a word with him too.

TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_020<tab>But to answer your earlier question─there's nothing we need you for right now. Only a matter of time before we call on you again, though, so kick your feet up while you can.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_021<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>A weekly quest which continues the story is now available from the dour dwarf in Komra.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Lend your aid and help the dwarves of Komra to rebuild their home.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You obtain a message from Konogg.

TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The message can be viewed in your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_DWARFMASTER03671_000_025<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERD03954_000_030<tab>To be deleted.
TEXT_LUCKTA512_04045_VILLAGERB03954_000_035<tab>To be deleted.
